name: Fire Fight (itch) (Oldcrow0999)
description:
Play as either the Sheriff or the Outlaw!

Controls:

Outlaw

W: Forward

S: Down

D: Right

A: Left

Q: Aim gun Up

E: Aim gun down

R: Reload

Spacebar: Fire Weapon

Controls:

Sheriff

Numbpad 8: Forward

Numbpad 5: Down

Numbpad 6: Right

Numbpad 4: Left

Numbpad 9: Aim gun Up

Numbpad 7: Aim gun down

P: Reload

K: Fire Weapon

Controls for all:

Hold H: to restart
